abstract: Mexican billionaire Carlos Slim Helu's holding company Inversora Carso says it will begin takeover attempt for Spanish building and infrastructure company FCC at price of 7.60 euros or $8.36 a share.

headline.print_headline: Mexican Tycoon Opens Bid to Take Over FCC of Spain
headline.main: Mexican Tycoon Opens Bid to Take Over FCC of Spain

keywords.value: Fomento de Construcciones y Contratas SA
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: The Mexican billionaire Carlos Slim Helú’s holding company Inversora Carso said on Friday that it would start a full takeover bid for the Spanish building and infrastructure company FCC.
lead_paragraph: The Mexican billionaire Carlos Slim Helú’s holding company Inversora Carso said on Friday that it would start a full takeover bid for the Spanish building and infrastructure company FCC.
